articles.title: NIH study illuminates origins of lung cancer in never smokers - National Institutes of Health
articles.description: Genomic analysis found that a majority of lung cancer tumors arise from the accumulation of mutations caused by natural processes in the body.

articles.title: Sleep apnea sufferers frustrated over CPAP machine recall - CBS News
articles.description: A voluntary recall of millions of Philips DreamStation CPAP machines has left tens of thousands of people distressed over going without a good night's sleep, or continuing to use a machine that poses risks.
